# StringExtensions.IsBoolean method

Determines whether this value is a boolean value.

Supported values are: "true", "false", "yes", "no", "on", "off", "si", "t", "f", "y", "n", "1", "0".

```csharp
public static bool IsBoolean(this string value)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| value | The value to check. |

## Return Value

true if specified value is a valid boolean value; Otherwise, false .
